Description: Rim sherd (mended from two fragments) of Attic pottery lip-cup; interior: reserved band at top of rim, glazed black below; top of rim glazed; exterior: lip and handle zone reserved with line between; inscription on exterior.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Aphrodite (Naukratis), Context Φ1
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1354) (phase 3)
